title: The orphan, or, The unhappy-marriage a tragedy, as it is acted at His Royal Highness the Duke's Theatre / written by Tho. Otway.
author: Otway, Thomas, 1652-1685.
publisher: Printed for R. Bentley, and M. Magnes ...,
notes: Based on a tale in Roger Boyle's English adventures.
